     <h1>

      </span>
     </h1>

         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17365810">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17365810">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Contact:
          </p>
          <p>
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
           IM (AIM, Yahoo): refcannon
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17365810" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17365811">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17365811">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17365811">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting to the full text
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17365811">
          <p>
           Once you have found the citation of a journal article you're interested in, click on the
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           <span>
            &nbsp;buttons
           </span>
           &nbsp;found next to the citation, or run a journal title search in Trexler Library's
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank">
            Encompass Search.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17365811" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17365812">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17365812">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17365812">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Reference works
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17365812">
          <p>
           standard dictionaries
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            <a id="link_24863977" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/oclc/869488612?databaseList=1708,638" target="_blank">
             The American Heritage Dictionary of the English Language
            </a>
           </em>
           Preferred American English dictionary.
          </p>
          <p>
           dictionaries of word history and etymology. . .
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            A comprehensive etymological dictionary of the English language. Dealing with the origin of words and their sense development thus illustrating the history of civilization and culture
            <br />
           </em>
           Trexler Library B level, call # 422 K64c
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            <span class="style5">
             The Oxford English dictionary
            </span>
           </em>
           <br />
           Trexler Library B level, call # 423 M982o
           <br />
           OR
           <br />
           <strong>
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://oed.com/">
             <em>
              OED Online
             </em>
            </a>
           </strong>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            Chronology of words and phrases : a thousand years in the history of English
           </em>
           <br />
           Trexler Library B level, call # 422 F588c
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            Grand allusions : a lively guide to those expressions, terms, and references you ought to know but might not
           </em>
           <br />
           Trexler Library B level, call # 422.03 W371g
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            The origin of medical terms
           </em>
           <br />
           Trexler Library B level, call # 610.14 S628
          </p>
          <p>
           thesauri. . .
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <strong>
            <em>
             Roget's Thesaurus
            </em>
           </strong>
           <br />
           Trexler Library B level, call # 424 B291r
           <br />
           OR
           <br />
           <em>
            <a href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.credoreference.com/book/hmrogets">
             American Heritage Roget's Thesaurus
            </a>
            <a href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.credoreference.com/book/hmrogets">
             <br />
            </a>
           </em>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <span class="style5">
            The synonym finder
           </span>
           <br />
           Trexler Library B level, call #
           <span class="briefcitTitle">
            423.1 R685s
           </span>
          </p>
          <p>
           slang dictionaries. . .
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            <strong>
             Green's Dictionary of Slang
             <br />
            </strong>
           </em>
           Trexler Library B level, call # 427.09 G795c
           <em>
            <strong>
             <br />
            </strong>
            OR
            <br />
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=Http://www.oxfordreference.com/view/10.1093/acref/9780199829941.001.0001/acref-9780199829941">
             Green's Dictionary of Slang Online
            </a>
            <br />
           </em>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            New Partridge Dictionary of Slang and Unconventional English
           </em>
           <br />
           Trexler Library B level, call # 427.09 N532p
          </p>
          <p>
           guides to quotations. . .
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            Bartlett's Familiar quotations
           </em>
           <strong>
            <br />
           </strong>
           Trexler Library C level, call # 808.8 B289f
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <a href="http://www.bartleby.com/66/">
            <em>
             Columbia World of Quotations Online
            </em>
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
           dictionaries of symbols. . .
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <span class="style7">
            <strong>
             <em>
              Symbolism : a comprehensive dictionary
             </em>
             .
            </strong>
            <br />
           </span>
           Trexler Library B level, call # 302.22 O44s
           <br />
           <br />
           and
           <br />
           <br />
           <strong>
            <em>
             Reverse symbolism dictionary : symbols listed by subject.
            </em>
            <br />
           </strong>
           Trexler Library B level, call # 302.22 O44r
          </p>
          <p>
           concordances. . .
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            <a id="link_24864227" href="http://www.opensourceshakespeare.org/concordance/" target="_blank">
             Concordance of Shakepeare's Works
            </a>
           </em>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <strong>
            <em>
             The Harvard concordance to Shakespeare
            </em>
            <br />
           </strong>
           Trexler Library C level, call # 822.33 A6s
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            Analytic concordance to the Bible
           </em>
           <strong>
            <br />
           </strong>
           Trexler Library B level, call # 220.2 Y75a
          </p>
          <p>
           gazetteers. . .&nbsp;
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            The Columbia gazetteer of the world
           </em>
           <br />
           Trexler Library C level, call # 910.3 C726g
          </p>
          <p>
           indexes. . .
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <span class="style8">
            <strong>
             <em>
              Granger's Index to poetry
             </em>
            </strong>
            <br />
           </span>
           Trexler Library A level, call # 016.81 G758 &nbsp;
          </p>
          <p>
           subject-specific dictionaries and encyclopedias. . .
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            <strong>
            </strong>
           </em>
           <em>
            <span class="style6">
             <a href="http://linker.worldcat.org/?jHome=https%3A%2F%2Fmuhlenberg.idm.oclc.org%2Flogin%3Furl%3Dhttp%3A%2F%2Fsearch.credoreference.com%2F&amp;linktype=best">
              Credo Reference
             </a>
            </span>
           </em>
           <br />
           An online collection several hundred reputable encyclopedias subscribed to my Muhlenberg College.
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            Dictionary of the Middle Ages
           </em>
           <br />
           Trexler Library C level, call # 909 D554
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            The Encyclopedia of religion
           </em>
           <br />
           Trexler Library B level, call # 203 E56
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            Encyclopedia of human biology
           </em>
           <br />
           Trexler Library B level, call # 612.003 E56o
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            Macmillan encyclopedia of chemistry
           </em>
           <br />
           Trexler Library B level, call # 540.3 M137e
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <strong>
            <em>
             Man, myth &amp; magic : the illustrated encyclopedia of mythology, religion, and the unknown
            </em>
            <br />
           </strong>
           Trexler Library A level, call # 133 M266m
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            Routledge Encyclopedia of Philosophy
           </em>
           <br />
           Trexler Library A level, call # 103 R869e
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17365812" class="boxatt">

       <div id="wrapbox17365814">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17365814">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17365814">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Periodical articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17365814">
          <div id="boxatt17365814" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20443044">
              <a id="link_20443044" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20443044,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Representing Body in Art ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12335038}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. Good starting place for journals from every discipline. Includes the full text of about 3000 journals. Limit to "peer reviewed" to find only scholarly articles. Back issues of journals begin as early as 1990. Recent issues may not be included yet, due to publisher agreement. Journals held in Trexler Library are marked accordingly.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20443045">
              <a id="link_20443045" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20443045,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Representing Body in Art ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12364481}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Archive from Stanford University of scholarly journals in all subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20443123">
              <a id="link_20443123" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=https://muse.jhu.edu/browse" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20443123,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Representing Body in Art ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12618824}); ">
               Project Muse
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Recent archive of journals from a number of academic presses.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17365816">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17365816">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17365816">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Search engines
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17365816">
          <div id="boxatt17365816" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20443053">
              <a id="link_20443053" href="http://www.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20443053,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Representing Body in Art ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20016760}); ">
               Google
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Non-selective. One of the largest web crawlers.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20443175">
              <a id="link_20443175" href="http://scholar.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20443175,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Representing Body in Art ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19855349}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               An open-access web crawler that looks for content it identifies as "scholarly." Emphasis is on books and journal articles. Intended as a "federated search" to search across disciplines (weighted toward sciences and social sciences). Not always full text. Check our Journal Locator (see above) to see if Muhlenberg has access to the full text.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4712999" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17365817">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17365817">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17365817">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing sources in an annotated bibliography
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17365817">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit Trexler Library's
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            <em>
             Citation Guides
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17365817" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17365818">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17365818">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17365818">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles via interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17365818">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17365818" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
